inputFields.name: boostEventsWithAtLeastNumImagesInChapter
inputFields.description: Boost events from chapters with at least N photos

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: The id of category of the event

inputFields.name: cityLocations
inputFields.description: City Boroughs or Neighborhoods Locations

inputFields.name: doConsolidateEvents
inputFields.description: If true, consolidate events in series and return the latest event of the series/recurring events

inputFields.name: doPromotePaypalEvents
inputFields.description: If true, get a paypal event and put it into third search result

inputFields.name: endDateRange
inputFields.description: The maximal date for filtering

inputFields.name: endTime
inputFields.description: The end time of day to filter events to

inputFields.name: eventType
inputFields.description: The type of the event

inputFields.name: groupJoinMode
inputFields.description: Who can join the group hosting the event and how. One of "approval", "closed", or "open"

inputFields.name: groupList
inputFields.description: Limit the event recommendations to a set of groups

inputFields.name: hasJoinQuestions
inputFields.description: If the group hosting the event has join questions

inputFields.name: indexAlias
inputFields.description: ElasticSearch index or alias to query

inputFields.name: isHappeningNow
inputFields.description: The event is happening now

inputFields.name: isStartingSoon
inputFields.description: Events starting within the hour

inputFields.name: joinReasons
inputFields.description: List of reasons to filter events more further

inputFields.name: lat
inputFields.description:
Latitude where the event is held.
If Lat/lon is not used, then "city, state, country" are used.

inputFields.name: lon
inputFields.description:
Longitude where the event is held
If Lat/lon is not used, then "city, state, country" are used.

inputFields.name: penalizeOnlineEvents
inputFields.description: Penalize online events

inputFields.name: prioritizeRsvps
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent RSVP

inputFields.name: radius
inputFields.description: Radius of searching the event (in miles).

inputFields.name: requiresPhotoToJoin
inputFields.description: If the group hosting the event requires a photo to join

inputFields.name: startDateRange
inputFields.description: The minimal date for filtering

inputFields.name: startTime
inputFields.description: The start time of day to filter events from

inputFields.name: state
inputFields.description: Location-related state

inputFields.name: timeDecayOffset
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent activity

inputFields.name: timeDecayScale
inputFields.description: Prioritize groups with recent activity

inputFields.name: topicCategoryId
inputFields.description:
The id of topicCategory [from topic taxonomy] of the event.
Used if categoryId is empty.

inputFields.name: topicList
inputFields.description: A list of topic ids which are used to filter for groups

inputFields.name: usePayPalEvents
inputFields.description: If the events should require payment or not

inputFields.name: useTimeOfDayEmbedding
inputFields.description: Use time of day embedding

inputFields.name: zip
inputFields.description: Location-related zip code
